title: Add Google Site Verification meta tag to homepage

requirements.summary: Add Google Site Verification meta tag to the head section of frontend/index.html
acceptanceCriteria: The exact tag `<meta name="google-site-verification" content="op0cJomiNM3AovX7LRR0RVy9JRJJjxlW7qdfJFYmo5Y" />` is present in the `<head>` section of `frontend/index.html`.
The meta tag appears before the closing `</head>` tag and before any `<body>` tag.
No existing meta tags, title, or other head elements are removed or modified.

file_operations.description: Insert the Google Site Verification meta tag `<meta name="google-site-verification" content="op0cJomiNM3AovX7LRR0RVy9JRJJjxlW7qdfJFYmo5Y" />` into the `<head>` section, placing it after the existing meta description tag and before the closing `</head>` tag. Do not modify any other elements in the file.
